list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor and enhance Brand model views and templates
Updated `BrandUpdateView` and `BrandDetailView` to improve user interaction and CRUD functionality for the Brand model. Made UI enhancements, including updated buttons and card layouts in templates, and refined URL naming for consistency. These changes streamline navigation and ensure a better user experience.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Add initial Django project setup
This commit initializes a new Django project named "DjangoSMS" with default configurations, a core app, and PostgreSQL as the database backend. It also includes IDE settings, dependencies in `requirements.txt`, and basic project structure files like `manage.py`, `settings.py`, `urls.py`, and WSGI/ASGI configuration files.

Add "brands" app with Brand model and initial setup
This commit introduces a new Django app named "brands". It includes the Brand model, migrations, admin registration, and integration with settings. Additionally, basic placeholder files for tests, views, and other app components were added.

Add "categories" and "suppliers" apps with models and setup
Introduced two new Django apps, "categories" and "suppliers", each with a respective model, migrations, and basic app structure including admin, views, and tests placeholders. Updated settings to include the new apps, ensuring proper integration.

Add "products" and "stock_movements" apps with models and setup
Introduced two new Django apps, "products" and "stock_movements", each with their respective models and initial migrations. "products" includes a Product model linked to brands and categories, while "stock_movements" manages stock inflows and outflows tied to products and suppliers. Both apps were registered in settings and include basic app scaffolding for future development.

Update database table names for stock movement models
Renamed database tables for `StockMovementIn` and `StockMovementOut` models to align with clearer naming conventions (`stock_movements_in` and `stock_movements_out`). Includes corresponding migration file updates for schema changes.

Add templates for base layout with header, sidebar, and footer
Introduced a base HTML structure with reusable components: header, sidebar, and footer. This setup ensures a consistent UI layout using Bootstrap and prepares the project for dynamic content rendering via Django.

Rename Brand model field, add utils, and update templates.
Renamed the `name` field to `brand_name` in the `Brand` model for clarity and consistency. Added a new utility method, `get_description_summary`, for truncated brand descriptions. Updated HTML templates for a more modular structure with Bootstrap components and fixed formatting issues.

Rename Brand model field and add CRUD views and templates.
Renamed the `name` field to `brand_name` in the Brand model for clarity and adjusted its ordering. Introduced ListView and CreateView for the Brand model with corresponding templates (`brand_list.html` and `brand_create.html`) to enable basic CRUD functionality. Updated URLs, admin configuration, and sidebar navigation to integrate the new changes.

Add CRUD views and templates for Brand model
Renamed the `name` field to `brand_name` in the Brand model for clarity and updated its ordering. Implemented ListView and CreateView with corresponding templates to enable basic CRUD functionality. Enhanced forms, updated URLs, and adjusted sidebar navigation for seamless integration.

Add Update and Detail views for Brand model
Implemented `BrandUpdateView` and `BrandDetailView` to enhance CRUD functionality for the Brand model. Added corresponding templates (`brand_update.html`, `brand_detail.html`) and updated the URLs to integrate the new views seamlessly. This ensures improved brand management and user interaction.

Add Update and Detail views for Brand model
Implemented `BrandUpdateView` and `BrandDetailView` to extend CRUD functionality for the Brand model. Added corresponding templates (`brand_update.html`, `brand_detail.html`) and enhanced the brand list view with action links for detail and update operations. Updated URLs to seamlessly integrate the new views, improving user interaction and brand management.

Refactor and enhance Brand model views and templates
Updated `BrandUpdateView` and `BrandDetailView` to improve user interaction and CRUD functionality for the Brand model. Made UI enhancements, including updated buttons and card layouts in templates, and refined URL naming for consistency. These changes streamline navigation and ensure a better user experience.
